name: Space Exploration Technologies Corp.
bossPosition: SVP Global Business and Government Affairs
goal: SpaceX is a private company focused on developing and deploying space technology, including space-based broadband services.  As a prospective broadband provider to European Member Countries, we are interested in EU policies related to telecommunications, broadband policy, data privacy and competition.
euInitiatives:
Digital Single Market
Space Policy
European Regional Development Fund
Broadband policy
Telecommunications policy
Competition policy
